<!-- Code generated from the comments of the Config struct in builder/hpe-vme/iso/config.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `cluster_name` (string) - The name of the HPE VM Essentials cluster to provision the instance on.

- `vm_name` (string) - The name of the instance to provision.

- `virtual_image_id` (int64) - The ID of the ISO virtual image to use as the instance instance source image.

- `template_name` (string) - The name of the virtual image to create.

- `plan_id` (int64) - The ID of the service plan that will be associated with the instance.

- `cloud` (string) - The name of the cloud that contains the HPE VM Essentials cluster.

- `group` (string) - The VM Essentials group to associate the instance with.

- `network_interface` ([]NetworkInterface) - Network Interfaces

- `storage_volume` ([]StorageVolume) - Storage Volumes
